events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue was categorized under Refund based on the customer's request about returning the wrong item.
Customer support agent Emily has been assigned to handle this refund request case.
Hello! I'm Emily, here to help you resolve the issue with your order and assist with your refund.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received to proceed with the refund?
Here is my order number 123456789 and the attached photo shows the item I received which is different.
Thank you for the details. We will process your full refund immediately and send you a return label for the incorrect item.
Thanks for the quick response and for issuing the refund so promptly, I really appreciate it.
The refund has been processed, and you should see the credit within 3-5 business days. Return label sent via email.
Just checking in to confirm that you received your refund and everything is in order. Please let us know if you need further help.
As we have not heard back, we will close this case. Thank you for contacting support and have a great day.
